snippet: On Saturday, collectors will crowd into 700 stores around the country to snap up limited vinyl pressings, making it one of the biggest sales days of the year for independent stores.
abstract: Collectors plan to crowd into 700 stores around the country for Record Store Day, annual retail promotion to help struggling independent stores; music fans hope to snap up limited vinyl pressings, rare releases and other gems not widely available.
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, collectors will crowd into 700 stores around the country to snap up limited vinyl pressings, making it one of the biggest sales days of the year for independent stores.

headline.seo: Ringing Up the Sales on Record Store Day
